channel.title: King Rework Version 1
channel.description:
[details="General Information"]
* Instead of having a separate class card for each faction, there will now only be a single starting king
* Ancient King will replace the current starting king.
* There will now be different kings for each faction/class
* Vote now refers to election and trial votes
* Each Neutral Killing should become a separate king. I'll make a separate thread for that and the NK changes [/details]
[details="King Types"]
* Ancient(Starting) king
* Any [color=LighBlue]Blue Dragon[/color] -> [color=LighBlue]Lawful King[/color]
* [color=Purple]Mastermind[/color] & [color=Red]Cult Leader[/color] -> Master King
* [color=Purple]Assassin[/color] & [color=Red]Cult Leader[/color]-> Chaotic King
* Any [color=Purple]Unseen/color](except for [color=Purple]Mastermind[/color]/[color=Purple]Assassin[/color] -> [color=Purple]Shadow King[/color]
* Any [color=Red]Cult [/color](Except [color=Red]Cult Leader[/color]) -> [color=Red]Crimson King[/color]
* [color=white]Fool[/color] -> [color=white]Depressed King[/color]
* [color=white]Sellsword[/color] -> [color=white]Rogue King[/color]
* [color=white]Inquisitor[/color] & [color=white]Scorned[/color] -> [color=white]Vengeful King[/color]
* [color=white]Pretender[/color], [color=white]Alchemist[/color], and [color=white]Mercenary[/color] -> [color=white]Selfish King[/color]
[/details]
[details="New Status Effects"]
[details="Blackmail"]
* Your target may not speak to anyone but you
* They may do this in a separate chat(Called Blackmail). You will appear as "Blackmailer" there
* Prevents the target from accusing, voting, and whispering.
[/details]
[details="Decree"]
* Prevents target from being whispered to, accused of treason, and targeted by day abilities
* The court will be notified of of which players have been issued a decree at the start of the day
[/details]
[/details]
[details="Ancient King"]
* Crowned From: None(Starting King) [details="Notes"]
* The win condition will work like it did before(It will be chosen between a few alternatives which are posted below.
* [color=white]Mercenary's[/color] shield(and other similar abilities if they get added) is the only thing that can stop Order Execution.
[/details]
* > **Passive 1: Tenacity-** Your abilities will bypass everything and not count as visiting. Immune to redirection. Your accusations of treason and vote will count twice. If there is a tie then your vote will determine the outcome. Your actions take priority over others.
* > **Passive 2: Loyalty- ** Immune to death at night once. If you are found guilty of treason then there may not be any trials tomorrow.
* > **Night Ability 1: Audience(Uses: Unlimited)-** Send a guard to summon your target to your private chambers for tomorrow. They may not speak to or hear anyone but you. Disables their day abilities. Prevents them from accusing, voting, and whispering. Issues them a Decree. [details="Technical Information"]
* They will be sent to a private room(called private chambers) during the day. They will only be able to see the chamber(also prevents them from seeing trials) and its chat.
* The chat will be called "Private Chambers" and can be accessed at any time. The king can speak in both the public chat and the private chambers.
* The king will appear as "King" in the chamber.
[/details]
* > **Night Ability 2: Order Execution(Uses: 1)-** Send a guard to kill your target. Notifies the court upon success.
* > **Day Ability 1: Royal Finger(Uses: 2)-** Immediately put your target on trial.
* > **Day Ability 2: Decide Fate(Uses: 1)-** Force the court to Execute or Pardon the accused. Pardoning will issue them a Decree for the rest of the day.
[details="Win Condition"]
* One of the following conditions will be chosen:
* (Chance: 67%) Survive to see the [color=LighBlue]Blue Dragon[/color] victorious
* (Chance: 33%)Survive to see the [color=LighBlue]Blue Dragon[/color] defeated.
[/details]
[/details]
[details="Lawful King"]
* Crowned From: Any [color=LighBlue]Blue Dragon[/color]
[details="Notes"]
* I'm not sure the second ability or passive should be. [/details]
* > **Passive 1: Tenacity-** Your abilities will bypass everything and not count as visiting. Immune to redirection. Your accusations of treason and vote will count twice. If there is a tie then your vote will determine the outcome. Your actions take priority over others.
* > **Night Ability 1: Royal Guard(Uses: Unlimited)-** Send a guard to prevent all abilities from targeting your target. May not target the same player twice in a row. Tells you who attempts to visit your target.
* > **Day Ability 1: Royal Finger(Uses: 2)-** Immediately put your target on trial.
* > **Day Ability 2: Decide Fate(Uses: 1)-** Force the court to Execute or Pardon the accused. Pardoning will issue them a Decree for the rest of the day.
* **Win Condition:** Survive to see the [color=LighBlue]Blue Dragon[/color] victorious.
[/details]
[details="Master King"]
* Crowned From: [color=Purple]Mastermind[/color] or [color=red]Cult Leader[/color]
[details="Notes"]
* Upon becoming king, the [color=red]Cult Leader[/color] can choose to become a Master King or a Chaotic King
* The [color=red]Cult Leader[/color] will not be replaced if the crowned [color=red]Cult Leader[/color] is still alive. There will only be a new [color=red]Cult Leader[/color] when the crowned one dies

item.title: King Rework Version 1
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Here is more what I would do for starting King for example:

Note: Kings in general can speak on the self defense stage. You don’t need to specify

Starting Good King

Passive 1: Tenacity - You are occupy and redirect immune. Your actions do not count as visiting
Passive 2: Loyalty - If you are lynched then there will be no trial tomorrow

Day Ability 1: Royal Finger - Put target player on the stand immediately
Day Ability 2: Decide Fate - Instantly execute or pardon a player on trial. If you pardon them then they cannot be voted up for the rest of the day

Night Ability 1: Guards! - Give target player death immunity tonight. You can self target (5 uses)
Night Ability 2: Audience! - Whispers between you and target player will be hidden from the public tomorrow and cannot be intercepted (4 uses)

Starting Evil King

Passive 1: Tenacity - You are occupy and redirect immune. Your actions do not count as visiting
Passive 2: Scheming - You are immune to death once

Day Ability 1: Royal Finger - Put target player on the stand immediately
Day Ability 2: Decide Fate - Instantly execute or pardon a player on trial. If you pardon them then they cannot be voted up for the rest of the day

Night Ability 1: Allies! - Learn if target player’s class if they are not Blue Dragon (3 uses)
Night Ability 2: Audience! - Whispers between you and target player will be hidden from the public tomorrow and cannot be intercepted. (4 uses)
Goal: The Blue Dragon loses or Unseen/Cult Wincon

Literally just replace the Day ability’s and nothing else for elected Kings and have Mastermind Keep convert if he is elected (just convert. Nothing else)

if we give neutrals their own Kings then you don’t actually need to change anything for most of them. Literally just have them keep their wincon and let Neutral King’s kit do the rest. (Besides Merc who can instead just have unlimited guards but with a cooldown and 2 brilders per block and Inquisitor who needs a heathen check)

If you REALLY want them to have a difference then let any elected neutral keep their primary ability. Whatever it is. But then make neutral king only have 2 guards to compensate

item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

If there is a scum you want to silence then you are either also scum or you are doing it wrong by giving them Lynch Immunity

But what if there are several scum? And it can be also useful for gathering information, just like jail is multi-purpose.

NuclearBurrito:

self target

Alright, but that’s not enough of a positive.

NuclearBurrito:

not count as a visit or be occupied

Again, that’s useful, but not that huge. Not counting on a visit on a GK is only useful against Circle of Death. For EK it’s the same except it can also bypass observers.

NuclearBurrito:

class that auto replaces

That’s a pro, but you can never be completely sure of the king’s alignment and it only has 3 uses on every king except the starting king.

Actually guard isn’t too bad, but preventing all targeters would still be more useful.

NuclearBurrito:

Jail doesn’t prevent communication because that happens over the Day

But it doesn’t completely prevent communication. They can still speak to and hear the king.

NuclearBurrito:

Ability removal isn’t my issue. My issue is that it removes access to the day chat.

Would it be fine if it was exactly the same yet it didn’t block the day chat?

NuclearBurrito:

So since right now the King DEFINITELY isn’t too weak that means that any King suggestion should be as strong or weaker than the King we have now

Ancient King

Notes
  • The win condition will work like it did before(It will be chosen between a few alternatives which are posted below.
Technical Information for Audience

  • They will be sent to a private room(called private chambers) during the day. They will only be able to see the chamber(also prevents them from seeing trials) and its chat.

  • The chat will be called “Private Chambers” and can be accessed at any time. The king can speak in both the public chat and the private chambers.

  • The king will appear as “King” in the chamber.

  • Passive 1: Tenacity- Your actions will not count as visiting. Immune to occupation and redirection. Your vote will count twice. If there is a tie then your vote will determine the outcome. Can speak during the self-defense stage of a trial.

  • **Passive 2: Loyalty- ** Immune to death at night once. If you are found guilty of treason then there may not be any trials tomorrow.

  • Night Ability 1: Audience(Uses: Unlimited)- Send a guard to summon your target to your private chambers for tomorrow. They may not speak to or hear anyone but you. Disables their day abilities. Prevents them from accusing, voting, and whispering. Issues them a Royal Decree. May not target the same player twice in a row.

  • Night Ability 2: Order Execution(Uses: 1)- Send a guard to kill your target. Bypasses death immunity and prevents all positive effects.

  • Day Ability 1: Royal Finger(Uses: 2)- Choose a player. They will be immediately put on trial.

  • Day Ability 2: Decide Fate(Uses: 1)- Force the court to Execute or Pardon the accused. Pardoning will issue them a Decree for the rest of the day.

Win Condition

  • One of the following conditions will be chosen:

  • (Chance: 67%) Normal Blue Dragon goal

  • (Chance: 33%)Survive to see the Blue Dragon defeated.
